definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆說她母親是這種服裝的支持者。

sentences.english: That meant political troublemakers who did not have a lot of support.
sentences.chinese: 其意思是少有支持者的政壇搗亂分子。

sentences.english: Supporters of the peg now have their response.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，聯繫匯率制的支持者腰板可以挺起來了。

sentences.english: That in and of itself should be enough to attract forward thinking investors and supporters.
sentences.chinese: 而且它自身對引投資者和支持者就足夠有吸引力了。

sentences.english: Organizers called on supporters to march from there to Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 組織者呼籲支持者從祖科蒂公園遊行至華爾街。

sentences.english: This is the place where the clericals have their meetings.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是教權主義支持者們開會的地方。

sentences.english: But in the wake of the Fannie Mae scandal, Raines still had legions of supporters.
sentences.chinese: 但在房利美醜聞後，雷恩斯仍有一大批支持者。

sentences.english: But Ludivine Kedziora, 29, is an EU supporter.
sentences.chinese: 但是29歲的凱季奇拉是歐盟的支持者。

sentences.english: Rival supporters fought running battles on the streets of the capital Conakry.
sentences.chinese: 不同黨派的支持者在首都科納克里街頭展開了爭鬥。

sentences.english: My paranoid supporters thought I’d been set up by somebody.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些多疑的支持者們認爲我是被某人算計了。

sentences.english: For proponents of the anti-stuff movement, renting is in.
sentences.chinese: 對反物質運動的支持者來說，租賃現正流行。

sentences.english: We'll stand by you, because we're your thick-and-thin supporters.
sentences.chinese: 我們是你生死與共的支持者，所以將一直支持你。

sentences.english: Several thousand supporters strained to catch a glimpse of the new president.
sentences.chinese: 幾千名支持者翹首企盼能一睹新總統的風采。

sentences.english: The boosters are guilty of over-optimism.
sentences.chinese: 支持者毫無疑問地過於樂觀了。

sentences.english: It also helps you to acquire leads which you can convert into loyal supporters.
sentences.chinese: 它也幫助你去了解哪些人能轉化成你的忠實支持者。

sentences.english: Pao's arrest brought thousands of his supporters to the federal courthouse and state Capitol.
sentences.chinese: 保逮捕了數千名他的支持者向聯邦法院和州國會。
